title: [BUG] MAUI: SKCanvasView crash only when running the app without the visual studio
body:
**Description**

I'm migrating an existing Xamarin.Forms drawn control (https://github.com/VictorKochetkov/Xamarin.Forms.CircularProgressBar) to .NET Maui, when I thought the job was done I found that when I run the app through From Visual Studio the control works perfectly but when I run the app directly from the phone a crash occurs and I don't receive any kind of information to find out what is happening, I can't debug either since if I run it through Visual Studio it works perfectly I'm a bit lost on that. I have added the:
`.UseSkiaSharp()`

In the MauiProgram class, I have also tried using:
`.UseSkiaSharp(true)`

I have also tried to install these 3 packages at the same time and in all possible combinations:

- SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls
- SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Core
- SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls.Compatibility

But nothing works, could you help me about it? Any other information you need you can contact me. Thanks.

**Expected Behavior**

That the application can be run directly from the phone without a crash.

**Actual Behavior**
Currently the application runs perfectly through Visual Studio but if you try to run it directly from your phone a crash occurs without detailing any information about what happened.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls 2.88.3
- Last known good version:  None.
- IDE:  Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2022 (64-bit) - Version 17.4.3
  - Android: Android 10
- Target Devices:  
  - Honor View 10

**Screenshots**

Here you can see the control working perfectly when the application is run through Visual studio:

![chrome_5sciTGJ3sB](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20904914/208062095-5d6ba295-1c05-47c0-a085-70b0fee4a343.gif)

**Reproduction Link**

https://github.com/nacompllo/SKCanvasViewCrash
